This is the **Blog Template** starter, includes all the packages and the plugins (eg: Contentful CMS, TailwindCSS)

## ðŸš€ Quick start

Make sure to fill up all the steps below :

1. Set up the Primary Color that you wished in `Tailwind.config.js` & `index.css` files
2. Add a favicon into `images` file and change the file name in `gatsby-config.js`
3. Create a `.env` file for locally build
4. ðŸ˜„ you are good to go now
